Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT A.AdminId, A.AdminName, A.AdminPassword, A.AdminFirstName, A.AdminSurName, A.AdminEmail FROM tblAdmin A WHERE A.AdminName = @AdminName END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spAdminR1] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all Admins and info ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 10 Oct 2020 */ @AdminName VARCHAR(50) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE FROM tblPhase WHERE PhaseId = @PhaseId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE FROM tblProject WHERE ProjectId = @ProjectId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spDeleteProjectRecord] /* ** Purpose : Delete an existing record in the project table ** Created By : Rockz ** Created On : 28 Oct 2020 */
@ProjectId int AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE FROM tblTask WHERE TaskId = @TaskId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE FROM tblUser WHERE UserId = @UserId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spPhaseC1] /* ** Purpose : Adds a new phase to the phase table ** Created By : Rockz ** Created On : 22 Nov 2020 */ @PhaseName VARCHAR(50)
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT PH.PhaseId, PH.PhaseName FROM tblPhase PH END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spPhaseR1] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all Phases and info ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 17 Oct 2020 */ AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT PPH.ProjectId, PPH.PhaseId FROM tblProjectPhase PPH END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spProjectPhaseR1] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all ProjectPhases and info ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 10 Oct 2020 */ AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT P.ProjectId, P.ProjectName, P.ProjectPhase, P.ProjectStatus FROM tblProject P END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spProjectR1] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all Projects and info ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 18 Oct 2020 */ AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SELECT P.ProjectId, P.ProjectName, P.ProjectPhase, P.ProjectStatus, P.DocumentLocation, T.TaskId, T.TaskName, T.TaskDescription, T.TaskProgress, T.TaskAssignedTo, T.TaskStatus, U.UserId, U.UserName INTO #FilterByUser FROM tblProject P LEFT JOIN tblTask T ON T.ProjectId = P.ProjectId LEFT JOIN tblUser U ON T.UserId = U.UserId
WHERE (@CurrentUser IS NULL OR T.TaskAssignedTo = @CurrentUser)
SELECT * FROM #FilterByUser WHERE ProjectPhase LIKE CASE WHEN @Initiation = 1 THEN 'Initiation' END OR ProjectPhase LIKE CASE WHEN @Planning = 1 THEN 'Planning' END OR ProjectPhase LIKE CASE WHEN @Execution = 1 THEN 'Execution' END OR ProjectPhase LIKE CASE WHEN @CloseOut = 1 THEN 'CloseOUt' END END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT T.TaskId, T.TaskName, T.TaskDescription, T.TaskProgress, T.TaskAssignedTo, T.ProjectName, T.UserId, T.ProjectId, T.TaskStatus FROM tblTask T END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spTaskR1] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all tasks and info ** Created By : Rockz ** Created On : 22 Nov 2020 */ AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT T.TaskId, T.TaskName, T.TaskDescription, T.TaskProgress, T.TaskAssignedTo, T.ProjectName, T.UserId, T.ProjectId, T.TaskStatus FROM tblTask T WHERE T.TaskId = @TaskId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spTaskR2] /* ** Purpose : Gets a task by task id ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 22 Nov 2020 */ @TaskId INT AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE tblTask SET TaskStatus = @TaskStatus WHERE TaskId = @TaskId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE tblTask SET TaskName = @TaskName, TaskDescription = @TaskDescription, TaskProgress = @TaskProgress, TaskAssignedTo = @TaskAssignedTo, ProjectName = @ProjectName, UserId = @UserId, ProjectId = @ProjectId, TaskStatus = @TaskStatus WHERE TaskId = @TaskId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE tblUser SET UserName = @UserName, UserPassword = @UserPassword, FirstName = @FirstName, SurName = @SurName, Email = @Email WHERE UserId = @UserId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE tblPhase SET PhaseName = @PhaseName WHERE PhaseId = @PhaseId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE tblProject SET ProjectName = @ProjectName, ProjectPhase = @ProjectPhase, ProjectStatus = @ProjectStatus WHERE ProjectId = @ProjectId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE tblTask SET TaskName = @TaskName, TaskProgress = @TaskProgress, TaskAssignedTo = @TaskAssignedTo WHERE TaskId = @TaskId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
DELETE FROM tblUser WHERE UserId = @UserId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spUserD2] /* ** Purpose : Delete an existing user ** Created By : Rockz ** Created On : 28 Oct 2020 */
@UserId int AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT UP.UserId, UP.ProjectId FROM tblUserProject UP END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spUserProjectR1] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all UserProjects and info ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 15 Oct 2020 */ AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT U.UserId, U.UserName, U.UserPassword, U.FirstName, U.SurName, U.Email, U.Initiation, U.Planning, U.Execution, U.CloseOut FROM tblUser U WHERE U.UserName = @UserName END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spUserR1] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all Users and info ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 10 Oct 2020 */ @UserName VARCHAR(50) AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT U.UserId, U.UserName, U.UserPassword, U.FirstName, U.SurName, U.Email, U.Initiation, U.Planning, U.Execution, U.CloseOut FROM tblUser U END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[spUserR2] /* ** Purpose : Gets a list of all Users and info ** Created By : Ruan ** Created On : 10 Oct 2020 */
AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN
UPDATE tblUser SET UserName = @UserName, UserPassword = @UserPassword, FirstName = @FirstName, SurName = @SurName, Email = @Email, Initiation = @Initiation, Planning = @Planning, Execution = @Execution, CloseOut = @CloseOut WHERE UserId = @UserId END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
